TypeSignature.Value: Public NotInheritable Class PrintJob Inherits Object
public ref class PrintJob sealed : Java::Lang::Object
.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PrintJob extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: This class represents a print job from the perspective of a print service.

remarks.para: This class represents a print job from the perspective of a print service. It provides APIs for observing the print job state and performing operations on the print job.
Note: All methods of this class must be invoked on the main application thread.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Function Block (reason As String) As Boolean
.method public hidebysig instance bool Block(string reason) cil managed

Docs.param: The human readable, short, and translated reason why the print job is blocked.
Docs.summary: Blocks the print job.

remarks.para: Blocks the print job. You should call this method if #isStarted() returns true and you need to block the print job. For example, the user has to add some paper to continue printing. To resume the print job call #start(). To change the reason call #setStatus(CharSequence).
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool Cancel() cil managed

Docs.summary: Cancels the print job.

remarks.para: Cancels the print job. You should call this method if #isQueued() or #isStarted() or #isBlocked() returns true and you canceled the print job as a response to a call to PrintService#onRequestCancelPrintJob(PrintJob).
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool Complete() cil managed

Docs.summary: Completes the print job.

remarks.para: Completes the print job. You should call this method if #isStarted() returns true and you are done printing.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Document As PrintDocument
public: property Android::PrintServices::PrintDocument ^ Document { Android::PrintServices::PrintDocument ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the printed document.

remarks.para: Gets the printed document.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Function Fail (error As String) As Boolean
.method public hidebysig instance bool Fail(string error) cil managed

Docs.param: The human readable, short, and translated reason for the failure.
Docs.summary: Fails the print job.

remarks.para: Fails the print job. You should call this method if #isQueued() or #isStarted() or #isBlocked() returns true you failed while printing.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Id As PrintJobId
public: property Android::Print::PrintJobId ^ Id { Android::Print::PrintJobId ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the unique print job id.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Info As PrintJobInfo
public: property Android::Print::PrintJobInfo ^ Info { Android::Print::PrintJobInfo ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the PrintJobInfo that describes this job.

remarks.para: Gets the PrintJobInfo that describes this job.
Node:The returned info object is a snapshot of the current print job state. Every call to this method returns a fresh info object that reflects the current print job state.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsBlocked As Boolean
public: property bool IsBlocked { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets whether this print job is blocked.
Docs.value: Whether the print job is blocked.

remarks.para: Gets whether this print job is blocked. Such a print job is halted due to an abnormal condition and can be started or canceled or failed.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsCancelled As Boolean
public: property bool IsCancelled { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets whether this print job is cancelled.
Docs.value: Whether the print job is cancelled.

remarks.para: Gets whether this print job is cancelled. Such a print job was cancelled as a result of a user request. This is a final state.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsCompleted As Boolean
public: property bool IsCompleted { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets whether this print job is completed.
Docs.value: Whether the print job is completed.

remarks.para: Gets whether this print job is completed. Such a print job is successfully printed. This is a final state.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsFailed As Boolean
public: property bool IsFailed { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets whether this print job is failed.
Docs.value: Whether the print job is failed.

remarks.para: Gets whether this print job is failed. Such a print job is not successfully printed due to an error. This is a final state.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsQueued As Boolean
public: property bool IsQueued { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets whether this print job is queued.
Docs.value: Whether the print job is queued.

remarks.para: Gets whether this print job is queued. Such a print job is ready to be printed and can be started or cancelled.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsStarted As Boolean
public: property bool IsStarted { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets whether this print job is started.
Docs.value: Whether the print job is started.

remarks.para: Gets whether this print job is started. Such a print job is being printed and can be completed or canceled or failed.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetStatus(class Java.Lang.ICharSequence status) cil managed

Docs.param: The new status. If null the status will be empty.
Docs.summary: Sets the status of this print job.

remarks.para:
Sets the status of this print job. This should be a human readable, short, and translated description of the current state of the print job.

This overrides any previously set status set via #setStatus(CharSequence), #setStatus(int), #block(String), or #fail(String),
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetStatus(int32 statusResId) cil managed

Docs.param: The new status as a String resource. If 0 the status will be empty.
Docs.summary: Sets the status of this print job as a string resource.

remarks.para:
Sets the status of this print job as a string resource.

This overrides any previously set status set via #setStatus(CharSequence), #setStatus(int), #block(String), or #fail(String),
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetStatus(string status) cil managed

Docs.param: The new status. If null the status will be empty.
Docs.summary: Sets the status of this print job.

remarks.para:
Sets the status of this print job. This should be a human readable, short, and translated description of the current state of the print job.

This overrides any previously set status set via #setStatus(CharSequence), #setStatus(int), #block(String), or #fail(String),

MemberSignature.Value: Public Function SetTag (tag As String) As Boolean
.method public hidebysig instance bool SetTag(string tag) cil managed

Docs.summary: Sets a tag that is valid in the context of a PrintService and is not interpreted by the system.
Docs.returns: True if the tag was set, false otherwise.

remarks.para: Sets a tag that is valid in the context of a PrintService and is not interpreted by the system. For example, a print service may set as a tag the key of the print job returned by a remote print server, if the printing is off handed to a cloud based service.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool Start() cil managed

Docs.summary: Starts the print job.

remarks.para: Starts the print job. You should call this method if #isQueued() or #isBlocked() returns true and you started resumed printing.
This resets the print status to null. Set the new status by using #setStatus.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
